ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: VLAN Operation

STEP.DESCRIPTION:
Select the path the packet would take from the source to the destination.
Drag the device in the correct order from first to last.
Select no path if no path is available.
When done, click the Check button.

Select the path the packet would take from the source to the destination.
Drag the device in the correct order from first to last.
Select no path if no path is available.
When done, click the Check button.

Drag the device in the correct order from first to last.
Select no path if no path is available.
When done, click the Check button.

Select the path the packet would take from the source to the destination.
Drag the device in the correct order from first to last.
Select no path if no path is available.
When done, click the Check button.

ACTIVITY.MESSAGE:
Congratulations, this activity has
been successfully completed.
